```{r}
library(primer.data)

```

We are using the governors dataset from the study "Longevity Returns to Political Office" to explore how the number of years lived after an election (lived_after) differs between male and female gubernatorial candidates. Our goal is to understand the relationship between candidates' sex and their post-election longevity.
